attributes.action: Stop people who move out of London remaining on London wages
attributes.additional_details: House prices around the south west and other areas in the UK have soared. Londoners are partly to blame, they are moving out of LDN to poorer areas of the UK whilst working from home and still getting paid London salaries. Locals from these other areas don’t earn nearly as much, it’s unjust.
attributes.background: People are moving out of London and buying in other areas of the UK whilst earning a london salary. They earn a considerably higher wage compared to others outside of london, especially around coastal towns. This needs to stop, stop these people receiving a LDN salary if they don’t live there.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about wages, including when to pay employees any additional amount for living or working in London, are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
